job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtjob requisition id ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwdltbrgtwe are looking for a fullstack software engineer to join our office in bostonltbrgtltbrgtspacemaker was founded in in oslo and was recently acquired by the global tech company autodesk together we will leverage our complementary teams and technology and more rapidly place our product in the hands of the shapers of tomorrows cities across the globeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout spacemakerltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtspacemaker sits at the intersection of machine learning and urban planningarchitecture see our website httpsspacemakerai and blog httpsblogspacemakerai our mission is to design better cities by helping developers and architects respond to rapid global urban migration without sacrificing qualityoflife in increasingly dense cities our software helps architects optimize their site designs for living quality using various techniques including ai ml and simulations we have offices in oslo boston barcelona gothenburg stockholm and paris our current customers are concentrated in europe but we are rapidly expanding globallyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout our boston officeltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtspacemakers us office is located in boston where we focus on developing predictive and generative design techniques and incorporating them in our productltbrgtltbrgtour employees have varying technical and educational backgrounds with degrees ranging from bachelors to phds in computer science civil engineering physics and math we are looking for people who share our passion for creating a tool that designs better cities and feel comfortable working both collaboratively within our small team and larger organization as well as independentlyltbrgtltbrgtwhile this office focuses on predictive and generative design we work on a variety of projects ranging from deep learning to energy simulations all of our projects share the common thread of requiring creativity to solve problems without blueprint solutionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout this positionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are a collaborative crossfunctional team of data scientists and you will fill the role as the first software engineer in our office you will be supported by software engineers in the oslo office as well as by members of our team but it is important that you enjoy working autonomously and driving technical decisions we are looking for someone who is interested in participating in our strong knowledge sharing culture in this position you will work on a variety of projectsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtexamples includeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtsetting up and maintaining services and databases in our cloudbased infrastructure which is mostly aws ltligtltligtcreate and contribute to spacemakers frontend code and web components which are mostly written in javascripttypescript and react ltligtltligtdevelop and deploy frameworks that enable machine learning model training and predictionsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat we offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtcompetitive salary and benefitsltligtltligtflexible combination of in office and work from homeltligtltligtcompany equity ltligtltligtinternational working environment grounded in worklife valuesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtto applyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtupload your resume transcript and cover letterltbrgtltbrgtmotivation is essential so we read cover letters thoroughly applications without a cover letter will not be considered please be sure include which aspects of our work and overall mission drew you specifically to spacemaker and what skills you hope to develop during your first year working at spacemakerltbrgtltbrgtif you have any questions feel free to contact us at bostonspacemakerai we also recommend reading up on our core beliefs at httpsgithubcomspacemakeraispacemakertechcorebeliefsltbrgtltbrgtat autodesk were building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine design and make a better world autodesk is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation gender gender identity national origin disability veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic we also consider for employment all qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories consistent with applicable lawltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtare you an existing contractor or consultant with autodesk please search for open jobs and apply internally not on this external site if you have any questions or require support contact autodesk careers ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggt with autodesk software you have the power to make anything the future of making is here bringing with it radical changes in the way things are designed made and used its disrupting every industry architecture engineering and construction manufacturing and media and entertainment with the right knowledge and tools this disruption is your opportunity our software is used by everyone from design professionals engineers and architects to digital artists students and hobbyists we constantly explore new ways to integrate all dimensions of diversity across our employees customers partners and communities our ultimate goal is to expand opportunities for anyone to imagine design and make a better world
